    • testTake_ItemExistsInRoomInventoryNotFullItemIsRemovable_ItemInInventoryItemLeftRoom

      @Test @DisplayName("Take, case: item\'s in room, inventory isn\'t full, item\'s removable \u00e2\u2020\u2019 item\'s in inventory and has left room") public void testTake_ItemExistsInRoomInventoryNotFullItemIsRemovable_ItemInInventoryItemLeftRoom()
      Assert item will be added to Inventory and leaves the room if item exists in current room, is removable and Inventory is not full

    • testTake_ItemExistsInRoomInventoryNotFullItemIsFixed_ItemInInventoryItemStillInRoom

      @Test @DisplayName("Take, case: item\'s in room, inventory isn\'t full, item\'s fixed \u00e2\u2020\u2019 item\'s in inventory and is still in room") public void testTake_ItemExistsInRoomInventoryNotFullItemIsFixed_ItemInInventoryItemStillInRoom()
      Assert item will be added to Inventory and is still in room if item exists in current room, is fixed and Inventory is not full

    • testTake_ItemExistsInRoomInventoryFull_ItemNotInInventoryItemStillInRoom

      @Test @DisplayName("Take, case: item\'s in room, inventory\'s full \u00e2\u2020\u2019 item isn\'t in inventory and is still in room") public void testTake_ItemExistsInRoomInventoryFull_ItemNotInInventoryItemStillInRoom()
      Assert item won't be added to Inventory and is still in room if item exists in current room and Inventory is full

    • testTake_ItemNotInRoomInventoryNotFull_ItemNotInInventoryItemStillNotInRoom

      @Test @DisplayName("Take, case: item isn\'t in room, inventory isn\'t full \u00e2\u2020\u2019 item isn\'t in inventory and is still not in room") public void testTake_ItemNotInRoomInventoryNotFull_ItemNotInInventoryItemStillNotInRoom()
      Assert item won't be added to Inventory and is still in room if item isn't in current room and Inventory isn't full

    • testTakeWater_EmptyBottleInInventory_WaterBottleInInventory

      @Test @DisplayName("Take water, case: empty bottle in inventory \u00e2\u2020\u2019 empty bottle gets exchanged by water bottle") public void testTakeWater_EmptyBottleInInventory_WaterBottleInInventory()
      Assert that (if empty bottle is in inventory and water in current room) after command "take water" the empty bottle will be exchanged with water bottle in inventory

    • testTakeWater_EmptyBottleNotInInventory_WaterBottleNotInInventory

      @Test @DisplayName("Take water, case: empty bottle not in inventory \u00e2\u2020\u2019 empty bottle does not get exchanged by water bottle") public void testTakeWater_EmptyBottleNotInInventory_WaterBottleNotInInventory()
      Assert that (if empty bottle is not in inventory and water in current room) after command "take water" the empty bottle will not be exchanged with water bottle in inventory

    • testDrinkWater_WaterBottleInInventory_EmptyBottleInInventory

      @Test @DisplayName("Drink water, case: water bottle in inventory, no water in room \u00e2\u2020\u2019 water bottle gets exchanged by empty bottle") public void testDrinkWater_WaterBottleInInventory_EmptyBottleInInventory()
      Filling up energy after eating or drinking was not implemented yet! Assert that (if water bottle is in inventory) after command "drink water" the water bottle will be exchanged with empty bottle in inventory
